Package entities.paths

Class Path_ThetaJoin_Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • entities.paths.Path_ThetaJoin_Query
  • public class Path_ThetaJoin_Query
extends Object
    A theta-join query where the relational atoms are organized in a path. The join conditions between the relations are specified as a list of lists of @link{entities.Join_Predicate}. Each element of the list refers to one of the joins between a pair of relations. The predicates are given in a DNF form as a list of lists. The elements of the outer list are combined with disjunction. The elements of the inner lists are combined with conjunction.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      List<List<List<Join_Predicate>>> join_conditions
      join_conditions[i] refers to the join between relation i and i+1.

      The number of relations.
      List<Relation> relations
      The relations that are part of the query.

      A path query initialized with a single relation.

      A path query initialized with a collection of relations.

    • Method Detail

      • set_join_conditions_as_conjunction

        public void set_join_conditions_as_conjunction​(List<Join_Predicate> preds)
        Sets the same join condition between all the relations in the path. The number of join conditions is l - 1 for a path of length l. The condition has to be a conjunction of atomic predicates. Disjunctions are not supported by this method.
        Parameters:
        preds - A conjunction of predicates as a list.

      • set_join_conditions_as_dnf

        public void set_join_conditions_as_dnf​(List<List<Join_Predicate>> cond)
        Sets the same join condition between all the relations in the path. The number of join conditions is l - 1 for a path of length l. The condition has to be a disjunction of conjunctions (DNF).
        Parameters:
        cond - A DNF formula as a list of lists of atomic predicates.

      • insert_wConjunction

        public void insert_wConjunction​(Relation r,
                                List<Join_Predicate> ps)
        Inserts a relation to the path (on the right) with a conjunction as the join condition.
        Parameters:
        r - The relation to be inserted on the right of the path.
        ps - A list of conjucts for the join condition between the new relation and the one on its left.

      • insert_wDNF

        public void insert_wDNF​(Relation r,
                        List<List<Join_Predicate>> cond)
        Inserts a relation to the path (on the right) with a DNF as the join condition.
        Parameters:
        r - The relation to be inserted on the right of the path.
        cond - A DNF formula as a list of lists of atomic predicates (between the new relation and the one on its left).

      • to_Quadratic_Equijoin

        public Path_Equijoin_Query to_Quadratic_Equijoin()
        Transforms the theta-join query to an equivalent equi-join on quadratically larger relations. If the join conditions include disjunctions, the produced relations may contain duplicate tuples.
        Returns:
        An equivalent equi-join.

      • to_Quadratic_Equijoin_with_duplicate_filter

        public Path_Equijoin_Query to_Quadratic_Equijoin_with_duplicate_filter()
        Transforms the theta-join query to an equivalent equi-join on quadratically larger relations. If the join conditions include disjunctions, the produced relations will be deduplciated.
        Returns:
        An equivalent equi-join.
